text: Na endio nilwakhwabarumbusia, khobanyoole okhumanya mbu indakano ya Nyasaye ni yatoto ne mbu inyanga yeyindukho ibula obukanakani tawe, olwa basolananga abeene khubeene shichila likhuwa liabu. Nyasaye yamanya obulayi. Balia bashila mulikhuwa liabu nibaboola mbu: “Toto efwe khulabombashila omusikiti.”
